entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear except mainly cloudy near the Ogilvie mountains overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. 40 percent chance of light snow near the Ogilvie mountains in the morning and afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 26.
